page.title: 11Laura's Family in Markinch
page.content: I come from a family of 5.My father's name is Ian Gordon,my mother is Anna,my sisters are Judith and Claire. My father was a student at Glasgow Uniersity and became a minister.My mother was a nurse at a Glasgow hospital.My sisters were born in Glasgow,but I was born in Markinch after we moved here for my Dad's work. I am 12 years old and I go to Markinch Primary.My sister Judith goes to Aberdeen University,and Claire attends Kirkcaldy College.My mother is a housewife and my father is chaplain of Glenrothes hospital and minister of Markinch Parish church.After church on Sunday we usually go home,put on the barbecue and have sausages for lunch. After lunch we sometimes go for a run in the car and have a walk in Falkland estate.
